extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains an action used to build an NAnt project.

actionInfo.name: Build NAnt Project
actionInfo.summary: Builds a NAnt project using a .build file.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Action Properties

Build File Path

The path to the build file.

Build Target

The Build Target property. For example: build

Build Properties

Additional properties, separated by newlines. Example:
WarningLevel=2
Optimize=false
